Description:
Responsible for monitoring navigation instruments such as compasses, radar, and GPS to ensure the vessel remains on the correct course and avoids navigational hazards.
Exhibit swift and efficient responsiveness to support the crew and passengers in maintaining a safe environment.
Accountable for steering the vessel and adhering to the designated course under the guidance of the captain.
Uphold diligent record-keeping of vessel movements, navigation particulars, and any encountered challenges or incidents during the voyage.Skills
Skills:
Has a License A.
Need to be able to make swift decisions and take action to ensure the safety of the vessel and all individuals on board.
Possess the ability to make quick decisions and promptly respond to ensure the safety of the vessel and all onboard individuals.
Demonstrate meticulous attention to detail to maintain accurate vessel course adherence and promptly identify possible navigational hazards.
Demonstrate rapid decision-making skills and the capability to take immediate action to ensure vessel safety and the well-being of everyone onboard.
